Class RemovalListeners

  • java.lang.Object

public final class RemovalListeners
extends Object
    A collection of common removal listeners.
    Since:
    10.0
    Author:
    Charles Fry

      static <K,V> RemovalListener<K,V> asynchronous(RemovalListener<K,V> listener, Executor executor)
